fonts.display: Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro, Inter, sans-serif

usage.h1: font-display font-bold text-5xl md:text-7xl tracking-tight text-[#0F1113]
usage.h2: font-display font-semibold text-3xl md:text-5xl tracking-tight text-[#0F1113]
usage.caption: font-body text-sm uppercase tracking-widest text-[#5E6366]

rules: Use Neue Haas Grotesk for all Headings (H1-H6).
Use Space Grotesk for all body text, labels, and data.
Space Grotesk must have 'tracking-wide' for small text to ensure legibility.
Never center text by default. Left align for a technical feel.

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 bg-[#0F1113] text-white font-body font-medium rounded-sm hover:translate-y-[-2px] transition-transform shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(94,99,102,0.2)]
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 bg-white border border-[#0F1113] text-[#0F1113] font-body font-medium rounded-sm hover:bg-[#F6F7F8]

cards.base: bg-white border border-[#5E6366]/10 p-8 rounded-sm shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.feature: bg-[#F6F7F8] border border-[#5E6366]/10 p-8 rounded-sm relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.base: h-12 bg-white border border-[#5E6366]/20 rounded-sm px-4 font-body focus:border-[#00CFFF] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00CFFF] outline-none transition-all

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use a moving gradient border (Cyan to Violet) for active cards.
visual_enhancers.grid_background: Use a subtle SVG grid pattern on the #F6F7F8 background to emphasize the 'Blueprint' theme.
visual_enhancers.glass_morphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for sticky headers and floating command menus.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use solid, high-contrast blocks.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use Neue Haas Grotesk.
DO NOT center-align everything. Use asymmetric grids.
Respect the 'Light Mode Futurism' theme: Clean, Bright, Sharp.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Startup Operating System. Think 'Linear meets Apple'. The UI should feel like a precision tool. Use the provided colors strictly. Implement the 'Tracing Beam' effect on the 6 Layers cards. Use the 'Tetris' grid for the landing page and 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard.
